description: Valid single offer with correct OfferRefID and OwnerCode returns total price
test_steps: Send POST /OfferPriceRQ with valid SelectedOfferList containing one SelectedOffer
Include three SelectedOfferItems with valid OfferItemRefIDs and PaxRefIDs
expected_result: HTTP 200 with PricedOffer containing total price and breakdown for each passenger type

description: Multiple valid offers in SelectedOfferList return individual total prices
test_steps: Send POST /OfferPriceRQ with SelectedOfferList containing two distinct SelectedOffer elements
Ensure each offer has unique OfferRefID and OwnerCode
Include at least one SelectedOfferItem per offer
expected_result: HTTP 200 with PricedOffer containing total prices for each offer

description: OfferRefID missing in SelectedOffer returns error
test_steps: Send POST /OfferPriceRQ with SelectedOffer missing OfferRefID element
expected_result: HTTP 400 with error message 'OfferRefID is required'
HTTP 400 with error message 'Invalid OfferRefID format'

description: OwnerCode missing in SelectedOffer returns error
test_steps: Send POST /OfferPriceRQ with SelectedOffer missing OwnerCode element
expected_result: HTTP 400 with error message 'OwnerCode is required'
HTTP 400 with error message 'At least one SelectedOffer is required'

description: SelectedOfferItem with invalid OfferItemRefID returns error
test_steps: Send POST /OfferPriceRQ with SelectedOfferItem containing OfferItemRefID 'invalid-id'
expected_result: HTTP 404 with error message 'Offer item not found'

description: SelectedOfferItem with missing PaxRefID returns error
test_steps: Send POST /OfferPriceRQ with SelectedOfferItem missing PaxRefID
expected_result: HTTP 400 with error message 'PaxRefID is required for each SelectedOfferItem'
HTTP 404 with error message 'Offer not found'

description: Valid offer with zero SelectedOfferItems returns price of zero
test_steps: Send POST /OfferPriceRQ with SelectedOffer containing no SelectedOfferItems
expected_result: HTTP 200 with PricedOffer showing total price as 0.00

description: OfferRefID with special characters returns error
test_steps: Send POST /OfferPriceRQ with OfferRefID containing special characters like <script>
expected_result: HTTP 400 with error message 'Invalid characters in OfferRefID'

description: Valid offer with duplicate PaxRefIDs in SelectedOfferItems returns correct total
test_steps: Send POST /OfferPriceRQ with two SelectedOfferItems having same PaxRefID
expected_result: HTTP 200 with PricedOffer containing aggregated price for duplicate passengers
